Labels.description: ZooKeeper is a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services.
Labels.io.k8s.description: The Universal Base Image Minimal is a stripped down image that uses microdnf as a package manager. This base image is freely redistributable, but Red Hat only supports Red Hat technologies through subscriptions for Red Hat products. This image is maintained by Red Hat and updated regularly.
Labels.io.k8s.display-name: Red Hat Universal Base Image 8 Minimal
Labels.name: cp-zookeeper
Labels.summary: ZooKeeper is a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services.

Labels.description: Confluent Schema Registry provides a RESTful interface for developers to define standard schemas for their events, share them across the organization and safely evolve them in a way that is backward compatible and future proof.
